annonstext:
Embedded software development is a broad knowledge domain ranging from C code in tiny microcontrollers to C++ code in the Linux operating system. At Cybercom Jönköping we have assignments and projects covering the whole range and we want to grow our team of developers. If your heart is in software development with a special itch for the challenges in the embedded software universe, then you will feel at home in our team. We also have high expectations on ourselves when it comes to creating maintainable, robust code, having efficient delivery pipelines and using modern, team based work methods. If you want to develop your skills together with us, we will provide a welcoming and open-hearted context for continuous learning and sharing.

We believe that you have experience from embedded software development or an academic degree in a relevant field. Or both. You are fluent in written and spoken English.

Jönköping is one of Sweden’s most dynamic and progressive mid-sized cities (in Sweden mid-size means between 100.000 and 150.000 citizens) and a lovely place to settle down regardless of age and family situation. Take a look at https://jkpg.com/en/  to find out why our numbers are increasing with more great people every year who choose to live and work here!

Follow our daily work on Instagram @cybercomjonkoping and look at this video:

Call our manager FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  TELEPHONENO to get more information!
